title: LG French Door Refrigerator LFX25991 Overview
description:
Buy LG French Door Refrigerator LFX25991ST - http://www.abt.com/product/57559/LG-LFX25991ST.html

Features:
Style and Design
• 24.6 Cu. Ft. Capacity
• Slim SpacePlus™ Ice System
• Contoured Doors with Matching Commercial Handles with Smart Pull™ Freezer Handle
• Hidden Hinges
• Premium LED Interior Light
Organization
• 3 Spill Protector™ Tempered Glass Shelves/1 Folding Shelf
• Full Width Temperature-Controlled Glide N’ Serve™ Drawer
• 2 Humidity Crispers/1 Bonus Drawer
• 6 Door Baskets (2 Adjustable Gallon Size)
• 3-Tier Organization™ Freezer
• DuraBase™ Solid Drawer Base
Performance
• Smart Cooling Plus System
• Fresh Air Filter
• Dual Evaporators
• Linear Compressor for Better Energy Quiet Operation and Durability
• Multi-Air Flow
• Electronic Temperature Controls
• Tall Ice & Water Dispenser
• Premium Water Filtration System
• SmartDiagnosis™ System
• Door Alarm
• LoDecibel™ Quiet Operation
